com.taursys.dom
Class XMLWriter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.taursys.dom.AbstractWriter
        |
        +--com.taursys.dom.XMLWriter
public class XMLWriter
extends AbstractWriter

This class is used to write a given Document to an OutputStream or Writer.
